info.name: RideWithDriver API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for RideWithDriver backend services

query.description: Available types: PRIVACY_POLICY, TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS, LEGAL_DISCLAIMER, DRIVER_AGREEMENT, TRANSPORTER_AGREEMENT, E_RICKSHAW_AGREEMENT, RICKSHAW_AGREEMENT, ABOUT_US, FAQ_POLICY, FAQ

body.raw:
{
  "profilePhoto": "https://example.com/profile.jpg",
  "fullName": "John Driver",
  "mobileNumber": "9876543210",
  "dob": "1990-01-01",
  "gender": "Male",
  "bio": "Experienced driver with 5 years of experience",
  "address": {
    "addressLine": "123 Main Street, New Delhi",
    "pincode": 110001,
    "city": "New Delhi",
    "state": "Delhi"
  },
  "experience": 5,
  "minimumCharges": 500,
  "negotiable": true,

  "languageSpoken": ["Hindi", "English"]
}

raw.description: TYPE options: AADHAR (needs aadhaar_number), DRIVING_LICENSE (needs dl_number, dob), AADHAR_IMAGE (needs image), DRIVING_LICENSE_IMAGE (needs image), GST (needs gst_number)

service field accepts: DRIVER, TRANSPORTER, RICKSHAW, E_RICKSHAW, INDEPENDENT_CAR_OWNER
